mapper.select: select v_id, v_title, v_pStatus, v_pBgnD, v_pEndD, v_mBgnD, v_mEndD, r_id, ca_id, v_Auth, v_x, v_y from vol limit #{listSize} offset #{startList}

select v_id, v_title, v_pStatus, v_pBgnD, v_pEndD, v_mBgnD, v_mEndD, r_id, ca_id, v_Auth, v_x, v_y from `vol` where v_pStatus between 1 and 3
and v_pBgnD >= #{v_pBgnD} and v_pEndD <= #{v_pEndD}
and v_bgnTm >= #{v_bgnTm} and v_endTm <= #{v_endTm}
and v_id is not null
and (
r_id in (select r_id from region where r_sidoNm = #{r_sidoNm1} and r_gugunNm = #{r_gugunNm1})
or r_id in (select r_id from region where r_sidoNm = #{r_sidoNm2} and r_gugunNm = #{r_gugunNm2})
or r_id in (select r_id from region where r_sidoNm = #{r_sidoNm3} and r_gugunNm = #{r_gugunNm3})
v_id is not null
) and
( v_location like CONCAT('%',#{vol_title},'%') or v_title like CONCAT('%',#{vol_title},'%') or v_organ like CONCAT('%',#{vol_title},'%') or v_detail like CONCAT('%',#{vol_title},'%') )
v_id is not null
and (
ca_id in (select ca_id from category where ca_highNm = #{ca_highNm1})
or ca_id in (select ca_id from category where ca_highNm = #{ca_highNm2})
or ca_id in (select ca_id from category where ca_highNm = #{ca_highNm3})
v_id is not null
) order by v_pBgnD DESC limit #{listSize} offset #{startList}
